column2: NHL_Stats_2020_2021$Pos = factor(NHL_Stats_2020_2021$Pos, levels = c("C", "R", "L", "D"), labels = c("Center", "Right Wing", "Left Wing", "Defenseman"))
NHL_Stats_2020_2021$P = factor(NHL_Stats_2020_2021$P, ordered = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggside)
ggplot(subset(NHL_Stats_2020_2021, GP >= 28), aes(x = GP, y = P, color = Pos)) +
geom_point(size = 3) +
geom_smooth(method = "auto") +
ggtitle("Can Position Indicate Amount of Points Scored Per Season?") +
xlab("Games Played") +
ylab("Season Point Totals") +
scale_colour_discrete(name = "Position")
